Package com.neet.MapViewer.Main

Class TileMapViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neet.MapViewer.Main.TileMapViewer

  • public class TileMapViewer
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int axeCol  
      private boolean axeIsPlaced
      Check if the axe and boat is placed
      private int axeRow  
      private int boatCol  
      private boolean boatIsPlaced  
      private int boatRow
      Variables for setting the items, boat and axe This is the default value of the boat and axe coordinates If the user does not want to change the default position, this will be the default position to display on the map
      (package private) javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas currentCanvas
      Variable currentCanvas is to show the current part of map The changes to the map such as the movement of the cursor will be updated to the current canvas to avoid conflict with the main canvas
      private static Cursor cursor
      Cursor variable used to init the cursor object
      (package private) static javafx.scene.image.Image items
      Variable to store the images such as axe and boat
      (package private) javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas mainCanvas
      Variable mainCanvas is to update the whole map All the component will be drawn on the main canvas
      private int[][] mapMatrix
      The map matrix used to store all the values from the map file
      private static TileMapViewer mapViewer
      Initialize the TileMapViewer object based on singleton concept
      (package private) javafx.scene.image.Image newImage  
      (package private) int numCols
      Variables to init the number of column and row of the map that is used to draw the map
      (package private) int numRows  
      private int numTilesAcross  
      private javafx.scene.image.Image originalImage  
      private javafx.scene.image.Image tileset
      Variable to store the images of the map and extract into the map matrix
      private int tileSize
      Default tilesize is 16
      (package private) int[][] tileType
      Array to store the tiletype to determine if the coordinate is occupied with obstacle or not

      Function to load the map file with matrices Creates a matrix to store all the values in the map file
